quotes.quote: Wonder is from surprise, and surprise stops with experience.
Wondering is healthy. Broadens the mind. Opens you up to all sorts of stray thoughts and possibilities.
Wonder is the desire for knowledge.
Wonder is the basis of worship
Wonder implies the desire to learn.
Wonder is involuntary praise.
Wonder is the heaviest element on the periodic table. Even a tiny fleck of it stops time.
Men love to wonder and that is the seed of our science.
All understading begins in wonder.
The wonder is always new that any sane man can be a sailor
The significance which is in unity is an eternal wonder.
To wonder is to begin to understand.
Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge.
Wonder is not a Pollyanna stance, not a denial of reality; wonder is an acknowledgment of the power of the mind to transform.
Mystery creates wonder and wonder is the basis of man's desire to understand.
From wonder into wonder existence opens.
If you enjoy living, it is not difficult to keep the sense of wonder.
No wonder is greater than any other wonder, and if once explained ceases to be a wonder.
Wonder is the precondition for all wisdom.
The world will never starve for want of wonders, but for want of wonder.
Always be on the lookout for the presence of wonder.
Wonder is the feeling of the philosopher, and philosophy begins in wonder.
The wonder is what you can make a paradise out of.
The less you reveal the more people can wonder.
The larger the island of knowledge, the longer the shoreline of wonder.
Wonder is the first of all passion.
Wonder is the beginning of all wisdom.
He who wonders discovers that this in itself is wonder.
We carry within us, the wonders we seek around us.
All wonder is the effect of novelty on ignorance.
